channel.title: Little spaces between NPC conversation
channel.description:
Hi guys, so I've been adding Npc conversations and whenever you click "click here to continue" it shows the chatbox and then switches to the next dialogue. How would I make it so that it doesnt show the chatbox at all? It's really annoying :( I'm using a 317 Pk Planet Source V3
All help is appreciated, thanks :)

item.title: Little spaces between NPC conversation
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
